item.title: The New Marjorie Taylor Greene
item.description: The conspiracist has been perhaps the most unlikely beneficiary of strange new respect in the history of Washington, now that she is feuding with Trum...

item.title: The Epstein Conspiracy in Plain Sight
item.description: An element of the American elite embraced Epstein as one of its own, even after his guilty plea, thanks to his wealth and his connections.

item.title: Trans Activists Now Have Veto Power over Medical Education Courses
item.description: The suppression of video courses I was featured in is yet another blow to open and honest debate about pediatric transgender medicine.

item.title: Speaker Johnson Proves the Necessity of Reviving the Nondelegation Doctrine
item.description: The Supreme Court should rule that Congress can’t surrender its core legislative powers, including over tariffs, to the president.

item.title: Business, Beware — Lina Khan Has a New Crusade in New York
item.description: Get ready for Soviet-style centralized control.
